title: Mine Action and Humanitarian Cluster Munitions Programme- Global
description: Under the Government of the Netherlands ‘Mine Action and Cluster Munitions Programme 2020-2024’ Danish Demining Group (DDG)/Danish Refugee Council (DRC) is funded in Afghanistan, Libya and South Sudan. Conducting a combination of land release, explosive ordnance risk education, victim assistance activities and supporting the development of sustainable national capacities. Contributing to increased stability, reconstruction and inclusive social-economic development.
